程序包 com.ayvytr.adapter

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    SmartAdapter<T>
    Real adapter class, return type of SmartAdapterKt.bind. You can inherit class SmartAdapter, but in most situations, call SmartAdapterKt.bind is enough.
    SmartAdapterKt  
    SmartContainer<T>
    Container for class SmartAdapter, include layoutId, viewType and bind, bind for init view.
    SmartDiffCallback<T>
    Outer DiffCallback for class SmartAdapter, default areItemsSame and areContentsSame is oldItem === newItem, you'd better overwrite it.
    SmartViewHolder<T>
    View holder for class SmartAdapter
